item.title: 10 Uncommon Things to Consider for New Construction Homes
item.description: There are many decisions to make when building a new construction home, before and after you move in.

item.title: Backyard Oasis - Inspiration Board
item.description: Creating a stay-cation worthy backyard oasis for my family has been my latest obsession.

item.title: Bali-inspired DIY Floating Brunch
item.description: You may have seen them on social media… Gorgeous photos of travelers enjoying a ‘floating brunch’ at a luxury resort in Bali or Thailand.

item.title: Before and After Decorating with Plants
item.description: I’ve never had much luck with plants… But our house has tons of natural light and a courtyard - yaasss!

item.title: Boss Guacamole!
item.description: You need this sassy guacamole in your life. It’s spicy with a little attitude and has just the right amount of texture.

item.title: Easy Options for Kids DIY Breakfast
item.description: My husband and I both have IT jobs and work from home full time, so our days already consist of trying to get things done in between a ton of meetings that start bright and early.

item.title: Hidden Tank Fire Table Roundup
item.description: I’ve been searching for the perfect fire table for our backyard, especially right now when the nights are chilly and we still want to spend time outside on our patio.

item.title: Restoration Hardware-inspired custom bed for less
item.description: I was obsessed with the clean lines and extra tall headboard of Restoration Hardware’s Lawson bed for the owner’s suite in our newly built home.

item.title: Shortcut Cocktail - The Caipirinha
item.description: If you haven’t already experienced the sweet bliss of a Caipirinha (heeeeey kai-purr-reen-yah - ‘aight), I highly recommend it.

item.title: Shortcut Cocktail Recipe - The Bellini
item.description: It was the last weekend of our 2-week holiday break and I knew Monday was going to be rough.

item.title: The Top 3 Work From Home Office Trends You Should Try
item.description: Tony and I both have full-time remote jobs, so when we started to build our new construction home, it was essential for us to have a work-from-home office space that fits our needs.
